Bangladesh:
Ghiyasuddin Mahmud Shah, the last Hussain Shahi Sultan and his Portuguese allies are defeated by Sher Shah Suri.
Humayun occupies Gaur, but leaves Bengal to Sher Shah Suri.
Burma: Toungoo forces capture Pegu; Toungoo–Ava War (1538–45) begins
Colombia: Gonzalo Jiménez de Quesada founded the city of Santa fe de Bogotá *some historians argue that the date of foundation was on 27 April 1539 The Panche are beaten by an alliance of zipa Sagipa and Spanish conquistadors in the Battle of Tocarema
Russia: Glinskaya died. She was succeeded as regent by Prince Vasily Nemoy.
